text: Kruthika Jayakumar is an Indian film actress and classical dancer. She appears in South India films. ==Career== Kruthika Jayakumar started practicing Bharatanatyam from age seven. She trained under guru Sri Mithun Shyam in Bangalore. She was performing at a show in Thiruvananthapuram when Malayalam film director Balu Kiriyath spotted her and convinced her to foray into cinema. She later auditioned and was selected for the role of Venkatesh Daggubati's daughter in Drushyam, a Telugu remake of Malayalam film Drishyam.http://www.tollymovies.com/news/newsDetails/3395-Venkateshs-daughter- Kruthika-Jayakumar-heroine-debut%3F/ She received recognition with the film. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |- !
